definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
lit. to strike with a muckrake (idiom), cf Pigsy 豬八戒|猪八戒 in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记; fig. to counterattack/to make bogus accusations (against one's victim)
The Nine-Toothed Rake (weapon of Zhu Bajie 豬八戒|猪八戒[Zhu1 Ba1 jie4])
to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
(dialect) henpecked/to be under one's wife's thumb

sentences.english: She rakes the ashes out of the stove in the evening every day.
sentences.chinese: 她每天晚上将炉渣从炉子里耙出来。

sentences.english: Horatio most like: it harrows me with fear and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 霍雷肖最想它耙我的恐惧和怀疑。

sentences.english: He is removing weeds with a harrow in the rice field.
sentences.chinese: 他正在用耥耙给稻田除去杂草。

sentences.english: The gravel under their wheels was new and smoothly raked.
sentences.chinese: 在它们轮子下的碎石还是新铺的，耙得很均匀。

sentences.english: It takes a long time, and I don't always get them all.
sentences.chinese: 耙叶子要花很时间，我还并不总能把落叶都耙好。

sentences.english: It takes a long time, and I don't always get them all.
sentences.chinese: 耙叶子要花很时间，我还并不总能把落叶都耙好。

sentences.english: At a school in Los Angeles, neighborhood resident Howie Nicholl is hoeing and raking.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉矶学校，街道居民豪伊尼科尔是锄和耙。

sentences.english: They feed at or close to the surface with their mouths wide open and gill rakers erect.
sentences.chinese: 姥鲨会在或近水面张开口及竖起鳃耙来摄食。

sentences.english: It is his duty to rake the ashes out of the stove.
sentences.chinese: 将炉灰从炉中耙出是他的职责。
耙标签粘铁在你的手提箱上。

sentences.english: Use trash cans to store shovels, hoes and rakes.
sentences.chinese: 使用垃圾桶来存储铲，锄头和耙。

sentences.english: You should fork over the garden before you plant the peas.
sentences.chinese: 在播种豌豆之前，你得耙耙地。

sentences.english: An unreasonable person talks senselessly, and a weak ox ploughs sidewise.
sentences.chinese: 人无理说横话，牛无力犁横耙。
我的那块地已经耙过了。

sentences.english: And they raked them softly under the mold.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻的把它们耙进土里。

sentences.english: That piece of land has already been harrowed twice.
sentences.chinese: 那块地已经耙过两遍了。

definition: (dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
